title: My House (2018 TV series)
text:
My House is a <a href="docuseries">documentary</a>/<a href="reality%20television">reality</a> series focusing on <a href="ball%20culture">ball culture</a> in New York City. It follows Tati 007, Alex Mugler, Jelani Mizrahi, Lolita Balenciaga, Relish Milan, and the commentator Precious Ebony. The series premiered on <a href="Viceland">Viceland</a> on April 25, 2018, and consists of ten episodes.
Distribution.
"My House" began airing in France on Viceland via <a href="Canal%2B">Canal+</a> on September 9, 2018. The episodes were all uploaded to YouTube in fall 2019.
Reception.
"<a href="Entertainment%20Tonight">Entertainment Tonight</a>" listed the premiere among its "obsessions" for the week and called the series "essential viewing" before "<a href="Pose%20%28TV%20series%29">Pose</a>". The "<a href="New%20York%20Times">New York Times</a>" "Watching" newsletter said it "will <a href="vogue%20%28dance%29">vogue</a> its way into your heart". In 2018 it won the <a href="MIPCOM">MIPCOM</a> Diversify TV's Excellence Award for Representation of LGBTQ in the Non-Scripted category over <a href="Channel%204">Channel 4</a>'s "<a href="Genderquake">Genderquake</a>" and <a href="RT%C3%89">RTÉ</a>'s "<a href="My%20Trans%20Life">My Trans Life</a>". The show was nominated in the category for <a href="GLAAD%20Media%20Award%20for%20Outstanding%20Documentary">Outstanding Documentary</a> for the <a href="30th%20GLAAD%20Media%20Awards">30th GLAAD Media Awards</a>.
